cpe:2.3:a:openbsd:openssh:7.4:*:*:*:*:*:.description: OpenSSH before 7.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service
OpenSSH through 7.7 is prone to a user enumeration vulnerability

cpe:2.3:a:openbsd:openssh:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:.description: OpenSSH 7.7 through 8.3 has an integer overflow in XMSS key parsing

cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server:2.4.29:*:*:.description: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.x allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code
Apache HTTP Server 2.4.17 to 2.4.38 privilege escalation

cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:iis:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*.description: HTTP Protocol Stack Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

cpe:2.3:a:nginx:nginx:1.14.0:*:*:*:*:*:*.description: NGINX before 1.17.7 allows HTTP request smuggling

cpe:2.3:a:mysql:mysql:5.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*.description: MySQL Server vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker network access

cpe:2.3:a:postgresql:postgresql:11:*:*:*.description: PostgreSQL versions before 11.4 stack-based buffer overflow

cpe:2.3:a:redis:redis:5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*.description: Redis before 6.0.3 allows remote code execution via crafted string

cpe:2.3:a:samba:samba:4.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*.description: Zerologon - Netlogon elevation of privilege vulnerability

cpe:2.3:a:vsftpd:vsftpd:3.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:.description: ALPACA attack allows cross-protocol attacks on servers with compatible certificates
